Getting 999 stats
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : Getting 999 stats
By Raistlin_Majere on Monday, August 25, 2003 - 12:34 am:

currently I'm at Breeder Rank A and have around 200K gold. I already have 4 towns available for me to visit. With the current training method I'm using I'm able to reach 2 stats up to 850-900 points in range and the rest plainly sucks :P. I'm still looking for a better way to make at least 3 stats around 900 points and look for new facilities and items that would help in training. So far I only have a well and artemis fountain (lowers stress and fatigue a bit). And in the 4th town they are selling an item called "oiru-oiru (oil oil?)" which lowers stress a bit(small amount) but costs around 5K gold each and at 200K i can only buy at most 40 pieces :) will see what i can do later if i finish the storyline :)
